snippet.title: Land of Towers Playtest
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2198970/Land_of_Towers/

Hello. Our team is pleased to announce that the development of the game is approaching the final stage and we are starting a open beta test. We need your help to polish our game.

Land of Towers is a VR adventure game for the whole family. Find your way to the mysterious lookout tower. During the adventure, the player will be met with intuitive quests and experience the unique atmosphere of the harsh, but picturesque environment of the mountain land of towers. Thanks to the advanced building system, solving tasks is limited only by the player's imagination.

#vr #vrgaming #steam
